sentences.cn: 你办理了人寿保险 吗 ?
他为自己投保3000美元的保险.

sentences.en: He insured himself against death for ten million yuan.
sentences.cn: 他投了1000万元的人寿保险.

sentences.en: He insured himself against failure by treating only people he was sure he could cure.
sentences.cn: 他仅仅治疗有把握治愈的病人，以使自己免于失败。

sentences.en: He insured his house against fire.
I have insured myself against accidents.
sentences.cn: 我已经给我自已保了人寿险以防事故.
我投保5000英镑的人寿保险.

sentences.en: I was properly insured so I'm sitting pretty.
sentences.cn: 我已经有了一定的保险,因而有备无患了.

sentences.en: Now, indeed, the happiness of Troy is insured.
sentences.cn: 现在特洛伊的幸福已经真正得到保证.

sentences.en: Once the insured has sold his policy, he naturally loses all rights to it.
sentences.cn: 一旦受保人卖掉保险单，他自然就丧失了一切相关权利。

sentences.en: Put them in a nice, insured, air - conditioned storage warehouse.
sentences.cn: 把它们存进一座条件好的, 上了保险的, 又有 空调设备 的仓库.

sentences.en: Read the small print in your contract to find out exactly what you are insured for.
sentences.cn: 请阅读合同中的附属细则，以便弄清您究竟参保的是哪一种。
这家公司给他的财产保了险.

sentences.en: The insured value of the airplane was greater than its book value.
sentences.cn: 该飞机的投保价值高于它的实际账面价值。

sentences.en: The only stipulation the building society makes is that house must be insured.
sentences.cn: 建屋互助会作出的唯一规定是房屋必须保险.

words.tran_cn: 保险；保险费；保险契约；赔偿金

phrases.tran_cn: 保险金额；承保金额；投保金额

trans.tran_en: if someone or something is insured, there is insurance relating to them
The insured is the person who is insured by a particular policy

trans.tran_cn: 保证（ insure的过去式和过去分词 ），确保，为…保险，投保
